panels.description: Shows rate of handled Unary gRPC requests from queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_method, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests from queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{grpc_code=~"Unknown|ResourceExhausted|Internal|Unavailable|DataLoss",cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval])) / ignoring (grpc_code) group_left() sum by (job) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests from queriers, in quantiles.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", grpc_type="unary"}[$interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of handled Streamed gRPC requests from queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_method, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of handled requests from queriers.

targets.expr: sum by (job, grpc_code) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{grpc_code=~"Unknown|ResourceExhausted|Internal|Unavailable|DataLoss",cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval])) / ignoring (grpc_code) group_left() sum by (job) (rate(grpc_server_handled_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to handle requests from queriers, in quantiles.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(grpc_server_handling_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job", grpc_type="server_stream"}[$interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of execution for operations against the bucket.

targets.expr: sum by (job, operation) (rate(thanos_objstore_bucket_operations_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of executed operations against the bucket.

targets.expr: sum by (job, operation) (rate(thanos_objstore_bucket_operation_failures_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (job, operation) (rate(thanos_objstore_bucket_operations_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Errors

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to execute operations against the bucket, in quantiles.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, operation, le) (rate(thanos_objstore_bucket_operation_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))) * 1

sum by (job, operation) (rate(thanos_objstore_bucket_operation_duration_seconds_sum{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval])) * 1  / sum by (job, operation) (rate(thanos_objstore_bucket_operation_duration_seconds_count{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))

histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, operation, le) (rate(thanos_objstore_bucket_operation_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Duration

panels.description: Shows rate of block loads from the bucket.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_block_loads_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Block Load Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of block loads from the bucket.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_block_load_failures_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_block_loads_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Block Load Errors

panels.description: Shows rate of block drops.

targets.expr: sum by (job, operation) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_block_drops_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Block Drop Rate

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of block drops.

targets.expr: sum by (job) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_block_drop_failures_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_block_drops_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))

panels.title: Block Drop Errors

panels.description: Show rate of cache requests.

targets.expr: sum by (job, item_type) (rate(thanos_store_index_cache_requests_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Requests

panels.description: Shows ratio of errors compared to the total number of cache hits.

targets.expr: sum by (job, item_type) (rate(thanos_store_index_cache_hits_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Hits

panels.description: Show rate of added items to cache.

targets.expr: sum by (job, item_type) (rate(thanos_store_index_cache_items_added_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Added

panels.description: Show rate of evicted items from cache.

targets.expr: sum by (job, item_type) (rate(thanos_store_index_cache_items_evicted_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))

panels.title: Evicted

panels.description: Shows size of chunks that have sent to the bucket.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_sent_chunk_size_bytes_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by (job) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_sent_chunk_size_bytes_sum{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_sent_chunk_size_bytes_count{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))
histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, le) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_sent_chunk_size_bytes_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: Chunk Size

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (le) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_series_blocks_queried{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by (job) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_series_blocks_queried_sum{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_series_blocks_queried_count{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))
histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (le) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_series_blocks_queried{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.description: Show the size of data fetched

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (le) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_series_data_fetched{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by (job, data_type) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_series_data_fetched_sum{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (job, data_type) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_series_data_fetched_count{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))
histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (le) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_series_data_fetched{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: Data Fetched

panels.description: Show the size of data touched

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (le) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_series_data_touched{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by (job, data_type) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_series_data_touched_sum{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (job, data_type) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_series_data_touched_count{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))
histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (le) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_series_data_touched{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.title: Data Touched

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (le) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_series_result_series{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

sum by (job) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_series_result_series_sum{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval])) / sum by (job) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_series_result_series_count{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval]))
histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (le) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_series_result_series{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to get all series.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, le) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_series_get_all_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (job, le) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_series_get_all_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_series_get_all_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Get All

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken to merge series.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, le) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_series_merge_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (job, le) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_series_merge_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_series_merge_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Merge

panels.description: Shows how long has it taken for a series to wait at the gate.

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.50, sum by (job, le) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_series_gate_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.90, sum by (job, le) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_series_gate_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))) * 1
histogram_quantile(0.99, sum by (job, le) (rate(thanos_bucket_store_series_gate_duration_seconds_bucket{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[$interval]))) * 1

panels.title: Gate

targets.expr: go_memstats_alloc_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}
go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}
rate(go_memstats_alloc_bytes_total{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[30s])
rate(go_memstats_heap_alloc_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}[30s])
go_memstats_stack_inuse_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}
go_memstats_heap_inuse_bytes{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}
go_goroutines{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}
go_gc_duration_seconds{cluster="$cluster", namespace=~"$namespace", pod=~"$pod", job=~"$job"}
